item.title: Life
item.description:
Hiiiiiiiiiiiiiii whoever’s reading!

I got sick of my good ol site again. Which means we’re restarting the classic ~2 year cycle!

I’m trying Hugo this time. I’m hoping it’ll make making site changes a lot easier because I love a good Markdown.

Anyways. I’m really enjoying doing Mlem stuff right now. I think the lack of time I have to do all the cool things I want to do is making me feel old. Adulthood stinks.

item.title: Services
item.description:
Services

I run a server with a bunch of stuff on it. If you want access to these stuffs, feel free to ask. <3

The following services should currently be running:

  • Jellyfin
  • Minecraft (Port 25565)
  • Send
  • Planka
  • Memos
  • Soulseek (My favorite social media)

Note that I hate piracy. I have never ever pirated because that’s evil and gross.

item.title: Work
item.description:
Work

I do stuff sometimes. This is a very incomplete list of things that I do.

New is up, old is down.

2024

  • Released Pieces of Peace by Jørgen Valdemar (Producer & Manager).
  • Released Up in Flames by Aching Hands (Manager).
  • Launched Mlem Records. A netlabel in cyberspace.
  • Worked on Moonlight Peaks.
  • Released the EP Amersfoort Tracks by DJ ZITwerK (Artist).
  • Joined the Little Chicken Game Company as a game developer, again.
  • Released the EP slob life nu dada by love sella (Artist).

2023

  • Worked on a decentralized p2p multiplayer solution.
  • Made a competitive multiplayer dodgeball deathmatch game during a game jam.
  • Released the drum machine Andie.
  • Ran a crowfunding campaign.
  • Graduated the Hanze UAS as an engineer of ideas.

2022

  • Registered a company.
  • Left the Little Chicken Game Company to finish education.
  • Worked on BlitzGT, a tactical 4v4 driving game that went under.
  • Hired @ the Little Chicken Game Company as a game developer.
  • Started interning @ the Little Chicken Game Company.

2014-2022

  • Worked on FroggieChat.
  • Made a ton of games.
  • Active in the game cheat development scene.
  • Plenty of growing.

2001

  • Drooled.
  • Was born.
